summary: Wallet Connection Function Search and Analysis
Nginx Serving Different HTML - Balance Query Cleanup Needed
MoonYetis Casino: Balance Fix & Nginx Config

message.content:
# 1. Buscar funcionalidades de wallet avanzada en el juego
  cd /var/www/moonyetis-slots/frontend
  grep -n -A 5 -B 5 "wallet.*advanced\|advanced.*wallet\|wallet.*panel"
  index.html

  # 2. Verificar funciones de depósito disponibles
  grep -n -A 10 "deposit\|Deposit\|DEPOSIT" index.html | head -20

  # 3. Verificar funciones de retiro disponibles  
  grep -n -A 10 "withdraw\|Withdraw\|WITHDRAW" index.html | head -20

  # 4. Buscar interfaz de wallet (modal, panel, etc.)
  grep -n -A 5 -B 5 "wallet.*modal\|modal.*wallet\|wallet.*panel" index.html

  # 5. Verificar funciones processDeposit y processWithdraw que implementamos
  grep -n -A 15 "processDeposit\|processWithdraw" index.html

  # 6. Buscar botones o controles de wallet
  grep -n "button.*wallet\|wallet.*button" index.html

  # 7. Verificar QR code para depósitos
  grep -n -A 5 -B 5 "qr\|QR" index.html

  # 8. Buscar house wallet address configurada
  grep -n "house.*wallet\|bc1p.*" index.html

  # 9. Verificar elementos de UI de wallet
  grep -n -A 3 "class.*wallet\|id.*wallet" index.html | head -15

  # 10. Buscar historial de transacciones o similar
  grep -n -A 5 "transaction\|history\|historial" index.html | head -10

content.text: I'll help you search for advanced wallet functionality in the game. Let me execute these searches to analyze the wallet features.

content.text: Let me use the Grep tool to search more effectively:
Now let me examine the main index.html file to see the wallet functionality:

file.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>MoonYetis Slots | Original Graphics v2.1 | Revolutionary Crypto Gaming on Fractal Network</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Play MoonYetis Slots - The ultimate crypto slot machine experience with real MoonYetis BRC-20 tokens on Fractal Bitcoin network.">
    <meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate">
    <meta http-equiv="Pragma" content="no-cache">
    <meta http-equiv="Expires" content="0">
    
    <!-- Fonts -->
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700;800;900&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500;600&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    
    <style data-version="20250623-032800">
        /* === VARIABLES CSS MOONYETIS UPDATED === */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        :root {
            --primary: #FF6B35;
            --primary-dark: #E55A2B;
            --secondary: #4ECDC4;
            --accent: #FFE66D;
            --dark: #0A0E1A;
            --darker: #060A14;
            --light: #F8FAFC;
            --gray-100: #F1F5F9;
            --gray-200: #E2E8F0;
            --gray-300: #CBD5E1;
            --gray-400: #94A3B8;
            --gray-500: #64748B;
            --gray-600: #475569;
            --gray-700: #334155;
            --gray-800: #1E293B;
            --gray-900: #0F172A;
            --gradient-primary: linear-gradient(135deg, #FF6B35 0%, #F7931E 50%, #FFE66D 100%);
            --gradient-dark: linear-gradient(135deg, #0A0E1A 0%, #1E293B 100%);
            --gradient-glass: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05) 100%);
            --shadow-lg: 0 25px 50px -12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
            --shadow-xl: 0 35px 60px -12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35);
            --border-radius: 24px;
            --border-radius-sm: 16px;
            --border-radius-lg: 32px;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif;
            background: var(--darker);
            color: var(--light);
            line-height: 1.6;
            overflow-x: hidden;
            min-height: 100vh;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }

        /* === BACKGROUND EFFECTS === */
        .bg-effects {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            z-index: -1;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .bg-gradient {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: 
                radial-gradient(circle at 20% 10%, rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.15) 0%, transparent 50%),
                radial-gradient(circle at 80% 90%, rgba(78, 205, 196, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),
                radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, rgba(255, 230, 109, 0.08) 0%, transparent 50%);
            animation: breathe 8s ease-in-out infinite;
        }

        .bg-particles {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .particle {
            position: absolute;
            width: 2px;
            height: 2px;
            background: var(--accent);
            border-radius: 50%;

<!DOCTYPE html>

            --gradient-dark: linear-gradient(135deg, #0A0E1A 0%, #1E293B 100%);
            --gradient-glass: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05) 100%);
            --shadow-lg: 0 25px 50px -12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);

            --border-radius: 24px;

content.text:
Great! Now let me search for the complete wallet functionality summary. Based on the searches performed, here's what I found:

## MoonYetis Slots - Advanced Wallet Functionality Search Results

### 🔍 **Advanced Wallet Features Found:**

**1. Advanced Wallet Panel (`index-casino-complete-1751366845.html`):**
- ✅ Advanced wallet panel with toggle button
- ✅ Wallet panel backdrop and content structure 
- ✅ Tab-based interface (Balance, Deposit, Withdraw)

**2. Deposit Functionality:**
- ✅ Deposit tab with form interface
- ✅ House wallet address: `bc1pnhnqmuhx9xtqd8naa9wa60ur2n5fv9emjpcethzdwn8kzkx4gv4sf7xkr5`
- ✅ QR code assets available: `house-wallet-qr.png` and `house-wallet-qr.svg`
- ✅ `processDeposit` function implemented

**3. Withdrawal Functionality:**
- ✅ Withdraw tab with amount input
- ✅ Minimum withdrawal validation (1,000 MY tokens)
- ✅ Balance validation before withdrawal
- ✅ `processWithdrawal` function implemented at `/root/frontend/index.html:2897`

**4. Wallet Integration:**
- ✅ Advanced wallet manager (`wallet-manager-v3.js`) with UniSat/OKX support
- ✅ Wallet connection detection and management
- ✅ Real wallet balance checking (`getTokenBalance` function)
- ✅ Authentication headers for API calls

**5. UI Components:**
- ✅ Wallet panel toggle button: "💰 Wallet"
- ✅ Deposit/Withdraw tabs with icons
- ✅ Balance overview with main balance display
- ✅ Notification system for wallet operations

**6. Found Files with Wallet Functionality:**
- `/root/frontend/index-casino-complete-1751366845.html` - Complete implementation
- `/root/frontend/index.html` - Basic wallet functions
- `/root/frontend/js/wallet-manager-v3.js` - Wallet connection management
- `/root/frontend/assets/deposits/house-wallet-qr.png|svg` - QR codes for deposits

### 📊 **Wallet Features Summary:**
- **Connection**: ✅ Multi-wallet support (UniSat, OKX)
- **Deposits**: ✅ QR code, house wallet address, process function
- **Withdrawals**: ✅ Amount validation, minimum limits, process function  
- **Balance**: ✅ Token balance checking and display
- **UI**: ✅ Advanced panel interface with tabs
- **Integration**: ✅ Connected to game engine and backend API

The advanced wallet functionality is fully implemented with deposit/withdraw capabilities, QR codes, and professional UI components.
